name: Drone Destroyer
description:
Drone Destroyer is a fast paced top down single player arena shooter where you and other combatants are placed in an arena for competition.

There are four game modes to compete in:

 It's everyone for themselves! Kill or be killed! The first combatant to reach the score limit wins.

A free for all game where combatants will continuously fight until one is left standing.

You and your allies go head to ahead against other teams. Be the most ruthless force in the arena, and claim victory by being the first team to reach the kill limit. This game supports up to 6 teams!

A fight for survival. You and your allies will stand against an unrelenting force of drones. You must endure through all waves of drones in order to avoid extinction.

Reign supreme among the chaos
  • Supports up to 150 bots even if it's too crowded in small maps.
  • Supports numerous drones for large scale battles.
  • Persist corpses! Through your kills or deaths, either way you will contribute to the mess.
Formidable bots
  • 5 difficulty levels to choose from. Ranging from harmless bots to challenging bots with deadly accuracy and quick movement.
  • Even playing field for everyone... except for drones. Bots have the same health and deal the same amount of damage as the player.
  • Bots may taunt, complain, or compliment though text after fighting them.
Choose your field of glory
  • 8 maps of varying size to choose from.
  • Includes debug build to help visualize pathing when editing maps.
  • Although there's no UI editor, maps can still be created and shared via plain text.
  • Maps are parsed during load time. No compiling needed.
Documentation for editing maps is provided in the Config/Arenas.ini file. Disclaimers

This project was built for a month long game jam. This game does come with limitations.

  • Multiplayer is not supported
  • Only mouse and keyboard is supported
  • 32 bit Windows is not supported
  • Only tested in Windows 10
